fields.name: Q1
fields.question: Who do I contact if I need to change or cancel my tickets?
fields.answer: Please call our free hotline on +44 123 456 789 between 09:00-17:00 Monday-Friday and we would be happy to assist with your enquiry. You can also email us on englandcrickettickets@example.com.

fields.name: Q2
fields.question: What happens if the match is cancelled due to COVID-19?
fields.answer: In case of a full cancellation of the match, you will be entitled to a full refund and will be notified by email in case of this event.

fields.name: Q3
fields.question: What happens if the match that I have tickets for is rained off?
fields.answer: If fewer than 20 overs are played, you will receive a full refund, otherwise you will still be responsible for the full price of the ticket.

fields.name: Q4
fields.question: Is attending cricket safe at the moment?
fields.answer: Matches will only allow fans to visit if it is deemed safe to do so. However, we strongly encourage you to follow local government regulations in order to stay safe.

fields.name: Q5
fields.question: Do you sell any England cricket merchandise?
fields.answer: Not at the moment! However, there is a plan to introduce this option soon to the website.

fields.name: Q6
fields.question: Will you be selling tickets for the Ashes 2021/2022?
fields.answer: Absolutely! We are just waiting for the exact dates to be announced, then the tickets will be available to purchase on our website.

fields.name: Q7
fields.question: I require disabled access to the stadium, can you assist with this?
fields.answer: Yes, please contact us via phone or email and we would be more than happy to ensure you have a smooth day.
